Advertisement Sergio Marchionne , 58, caused a stir in Italy after saying Feb. 4 the Turin-based carmaker and Chrysler Group LLC may end up looking like one entity, possibly based in the U.S.. He later backtracked, saying no decision has been made and the issue would be dealt with no sooner than 2014. Fiat owns a 25 percent stake in Auburn Hills-based Chrysler.

Tayshaun Prince added 26 points and 11 rebounds for the Pistons, who had lost their first two games since acquiring Allen Iverson from Denver last week for All-Star point guard Chauncey Billups , key reserve Antonio McDyess and Cheikh Samb .
